feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:57 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
